page.title: 13LOCAL EVENTS,WEST KILBRIDE(2
page.content:
{GALA WEEK} June 1st-June 7th is one of the busiest weeks of the year in West Kilbride. It is because it is Gala Week. The people of the village pick the Gala Queen. Activities range from discos to shows and trips to bonfires. Money is also raised for local charities.
{FLOWER SHOW This takes place in the{Public Hall every year and is very popular with young and old alike. There are a number of different classes and each person can enter as many as they wish. Our village flower show is regarded as one of the best in the area.
